title: Crime Alert 06.30.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 06.30.21
description:
Former NFL star charged with sexual misconduct with a 7-year-old girl. Suspect in the death of a 2-year-old grabs deputy's gun during interview.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
